verses.verse: Behold <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, what manner <S%G4217><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> hath bestowed <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> upon us <S%G2254><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we should be called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5686><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> it knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> are we <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it doth <S%G5319><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> appear <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> we shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%>, when <S%G1437><s%> he shall appear <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, we shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> we shall see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5695><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%> that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> purifieth <S%G48><s%> <S%G5719><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> pure <S%G53><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> committeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> transgresseht <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G458><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the Torah <S%G458><s%>: for <S%G2532><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the transgression of the Torah <S%G458><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: whosoever <S%G3956><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%> <S%G5723><s%> hath <S%G3708><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5758><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Little children <S%G5040><s%>, let <S%G4105><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G4105><s%> <S%G5720><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>.

He that committeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%> <S%G5719><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>. For <S%G1519><s%> this purpose <S%G5124><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might destroy <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5661><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>: whosoever <S%G3956><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> he that loveth <S%G25><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the message <S%G31><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> ye heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we should love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5725><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Kayin <S%G2535><s%>, who was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> that wicked one <S%G4190><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> slew <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> wherefore <S%G5484><s%> <S%G5101><s%> slew <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5656><s%> he him <S%G846><s%>? Because <S%G3754><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother's <S%G80><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>.

We know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have passed <S%G3327><s%> <S%G5758><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>. He that loveth <S%G25><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> hateth <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> a murderer <S%G443><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> murderer <S%G443><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> perceive we <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5758><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of 'Elohim, because <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> laid down <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to lay down <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5721><s%> our lives <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whoso <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> `olam hazeh's <S%G2889><s%> good <S%G979><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seeth <S%G2334><s%> <S%G5725><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> need <S%G5532><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shutteth up <S%G2808><s%> <S%G5661><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> of compassion from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

My <S%G3450><s%> little children <S%G5040><s%>, let us <S%G25><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5725><s%> in word <S%G3056><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> in tongue <S%G1100><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> in deed <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in truth <S%G225><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall assure <S%G3982><s%> <S%G5692><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> condemn us <S%G2607><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> than our <S%G2257><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, if <S%G3362><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> condemn <S%G2607><s%> <S%G5725><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> not <S%G3362><s%>, then have we <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, we receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> those things that are pleasing <S%G701><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>, That <S%G2443><s%> we should believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5661><s%> on the name <S%G3686><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5725><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that keepeth <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%> dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, by <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he hath given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>.
